position: Urban Planner(AITP),Climate Change Analyst , Health Analytics, Social Impact Consulting,  Data Science, Public policy Analyst + Climate Innovation Lab

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Conducting environmental assessments and impact studies to identify potential risks and benefits associated with tourism development.Developing sustainable tourism policies, guidelines, and strategies for governments and tourism organizations.Collaborating with local communities to ensure their active participation in decision-making processes and to foster community-based ecotourism initiatives.Designing visitor management plans to minimize negative environmental impacts and promote responsible visitor behavior.Analyzing tourism trends and market demands to identify niche tourism opportunities and develop marketing strategies.Conducting feasibility studies and economic assessments for proposed ecotourism projects.Conducting feasibility studies and economic assessments for proposed ecotourism projects.Collaborating with architects, urban planners, and developers to integrate ecotourism principles into spatial plans and development projects.Providing training and capacity-building programs for local stakeholders, including community members and tourism operators, to enhance their understanding of sustainable practices.
